body: Here, we know that this change would always enable jemalloc to build irrespective of whether it is configured. If we don't do this, then code in tensorflow/BUILD that enables jemalloc only for k8 cpu will never allow jemalloc to be built on non-x86 arch. Kindly suggest appropriate way to handle ppc64le case too.
body_html: Here, we know that this change would always enable jemalloc to build irrespective of whether it is configured. If we don't do this, then code in tensorflow/BUILD that enables jemalloc only for k8 cpu will never allow jemalloc to be built on non-x86 arch. Kindly suggest appropriate way to handle ppc64le case too.
body_text: Here, we know that this change would always enable jemalloc to build irrespective of whether it is configured. If we don't do this, then code in tensorflow/BUILD that enables jemalloc only for k8 cpu will never allow jemalloc to be built on non-x86 arch. Kindly suggest appropriate way to handle ppc64le case too.
